code: import React from"react";import UserContext from"./UserContext";import"../blocks/elements.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Card(_ref){let{name,link,handleCardClick,handleDeleteCard,handleCardLike,likes,_id,owner}=_ref;const user=React.useContext(UserContext);const hasLike=()=>{return likes.some(like=>like._id===user._id);};const cardOwner=()=>{return owner._id===user._id;};const handleClick=()=>{handleCardClick({name,link,_id});};const deleteCard=()=>{handleDeleteCard({_id});};function handleLike(){handleCardLike({_id},hasLike());}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"template",id:"template",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("figure",{className:"elements__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"elements__image",alt:name,src:link,onClick:handleClick}),cardOwner()&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"elements__image-delete-btn",onClick:deleteCard}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("figcaption",{className:"elements__image-description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"elements__image-description-title",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`elements__image-like-btn ${hasLike()?"elements__image-like-btn-active":" "}`,type:"button",onClick:handleLike,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"elements__counter",children:likes.length})})]})]})});}
